formElement.label: Database engine:
formElement.documentation: Choose the database engine you want to connect to.

formElement.label: Database name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the database you want to use.

formElement.label: Port:
formElement.documentation: Database port. Some of the default ports are: Mysql: 3306, SQLServer: 1433, Oracle: 1521, Postgres: 5432.

formElement.label: Enable transactions
formElement.documentation: If cheched this option will protect your data in case of errors.

formElement.label: Display format:
formElement.documentation: Choose any of the available display formats.

formElement.label: Sql query
formElement.documentation: The query you want to run against the database.

formElement.label: Sql file:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to a sql script

formElement.label: Configuration name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration that contains the database user and password.

formElement.label: Result (output property path)
formElement.documentation: Property name used to store the result of queries.
